# nv-tabs



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property                          | Attribute              | Description              | Type     | Default     |
| --------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `defaultSelectedTab` _(required)_ | `default-selected-tab` | The default selected tab | `string` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event       | Description                                           | Type                            |
| ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| `tabChange` | Event that is emitted when a new tab item is selected | `CustomEvent<number \| string>` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                    |
| ---- | ------------------------------ |
|      | Collection of `nv-tab-item`'s. |
